thread.title: 'Arrival', 'La La Land', and 'Zootopia' Among Winners of the ACE Eddie Awards
thread.title_full: 'Arrival', 'La La Land', and 'Zootopia' Among Winners of the ACE Eddie Awards

author: V Renée
title: 'Arrival', 'La La Land', and 'Zootopia' Among Winners of the ACE Eddie Awards
text:
'Arrival', 'La La Land', and 'Zootopia' Among Winners of the ACE Eddie Awards Which films and editors took home trophies at the 2017 ACE Eddie Awards? 
If you're an editor, chances are you get hyped up for an awards ceremony other than the Oscars: the Eddies. Yesterday, the American Cinema Editors (ACE) 67th Annual Eddie Awards were held at the Beverly Hilton Hotel where some of the greatest editors on the planet received honors, including Thelma Schoonmaker, Janet Ashikaga, and more Joe Walker. 
The full list of winners has officially been released ; you can check them out below: BEST EDITED FEATURE FILM (DRAMATIC) 
Arrival: Joe Walker, ACE BEST EDITED FEATURE FILM (COMEDY) 
La La Land: Tom Cross, ACE BEST EDITED ANIMATED FEATURE FILM 
Zootopia: Fabienne Rawley and Jeremy Milton 'Zootopia' 
O.J.: Made in America: Bret Granato, Maya Mumma and Ben Sozanski BEST EDITED DOCUMENTARY (TELEVISION) 
Everything Is Copy–Nora Ephron: Scripted and Unscripted : Bob Eisenhardt, ACE BEST EDITED HALF-HOUR SERIES 
Veep: “Morning After” : Steven Rasch, ACE 'OJ: Made in America' BEST EDITED ONE-HOUR SERIES (COMMERCIAL) 
This is Us: “Pilot”: David L. Bertman, ACE BEST EDITED ONE-HOUR SERIES (NON-COMMERCIAL) 
Game of Thrones: "Battle of the Bastards": Tim Porter, ACE BEST EDITED MINISERIES OR MOTION PICTURE (NON-THEATRICAL) 
All the Way : Carol Littleton, ACE 'Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown': “Senegal” BEST EDITED NON-SCRIPTED SERIES: 
Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown: “Senegal”: Mustafa Bhagat STUDENT COMPETITION 
Tommy Wakefield, University of North Carolina, School of the Arts 
Which films, documentaries, and TV shows do you think had the best editing of the year? Let us know in the comments below!
